background_info: user_name: Samantha, user_description: The Luxury Business Traveler. Has a very specific hotel requirement near a venue.

conversation.content: Find a 5-star hotel within 1 mile of the Moscone Center in San Francisco that has a gym.
Certainly. The St. Regis San Francisco and the Four Seasons Hotel are both 5-star properties within that distance and feature excellent fitness centers.

expected.task_goal: Satisfy all constraints: 5-star, within 1 mile of Moscone Center, has a gym.
